code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./Sidebar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=()=>{const location=useLocation();const menuItems=[{path:'/admin',icon:'üìä',label:'Dashboard'},{path:'/admin/calendar',icon:'üìÖ',label:'Calendario'},{path:'/admin/appointments',icon:'üìÜ',label:'Citas'},{path:'/admin/leads',icon:'üéØ',label:'Leads'},{path:'/admin/clients',icon:'üë•',label:'Clientes'},{path:'/admin/settings',icon:'‚öôÔ∏è',label:'Configuraci√≥n'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("aside",{className:"sidebar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"sidebar-nav",children:menuItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:item.path,className:"sidebar-link ".concat(location.pathname===item.path?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"sidebar-icon",children:item.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"sidebar-label",children:item.label})]},item.path))})});};export default Sidebar;
